timeline.bodyText: looks like the test is failing at below self.kafka.stop_node(node) call, without snapshot.trust.empty config.  Can we check for topic/znode existence in ZK after upgrade. We can use ZK cli/kafka-topic describe? This way we can test ZK server availability and znode  data existence after upgrade.
